column1: // AMOUNT - The amount the recipient should receive. It can be expressed either in dollars or in target tokens. If you
// want the recipient to receive an amount of tokens equivalent to the specified dollar value
// empty. If you want to send a specific number of tokens to the recipient
column2: set the last parameter to true.

column1: // TARGET_TOKEN - tokens that the recipient will receive

column2: if true - AMOUNT parameter becomes token value
column3: if nothing (false) - AMOUNT parameter is in $
